other.text: Hi there! How can I help you today?
I'm just code, but I'm here to assist you!
I don't have a name, but you can call me V2X Assistant!
Currently, I am only able to provide static responses to predefined queries. However, some sample aircraft-related queries are available for you to try.

triggers: what actions are recommended to take off in significant wind shear on a boeing 727
other.text: Consider taking off in a different direction or delaying the takeoff until conditions are more favorable. If sheer suspected and takeoff is not obstacle-limited, use speed greater than V2+10 for the initial climb to provide additional protection from decreasing headwinds or downdrafts.

triggers: an airbus a310 is experiencing an apu fire how should i respond
other.text: Fire Handle -> PULL. Agent After 10 Seconds -> DISCHARGE. Master Switch -> OFF. If fire warning persists land as soon as possible.

triggers: i see a blue colored diamond symbol on the right center of my ivsi with the number 0.7 below it what does this mean
other.text: This is a standard indication as per the A310 Operating Manual. Please refer to the manual for more details.

triggers: my airspeed indicator is warning me of low airspeed. what actions should i take
other.text: Be sure to maintain a safe airspeed as per the appropriate aircraft operating procedures. If needed, decrease the pitch attitude to lower the angle of attack and regain proper airspeed.
